PRETTISEST Long Curly Wavy Wig Ombre 28 Inches Body Wave Wigs for Black White Women Replacement Synthetic Body Wave Wig (Color:#1B)
PRETTIEST
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'PRETTIEST', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 8.54 x 2.05 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'UPC': '778862790109'}
Honestly I love this wig <3 shes pretty thick for the price. If you ever see this wig on sale, get it !! I literally took it out of the bag and started using it. Imagine when I style it. I have brushed it and it does shed but not as much as other cheap wigs. Overall this wig is amazing. I wish bought multiple now
Amazing <3
Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
Beauty Bakerie
['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.']
{'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'}
Super pigmented, when dried. It stays put and will go no where. It comes off with regular methods, just alot harder then a oil based remover. I highly recommend for the staying power !!
Will stay put after drying!

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys long, wavy, and curly synthetic wigs in modern styles with vibrant colors. Recently expanded interest to high-quality cosmetic products and nail care essentials that enhance their appearance.
- **Quality Expectations:** Seeks good value for price, with a focus on thickness and durability in wigs. Values longevity and ease of use in all beauty products, favoring smudge-proof and long-lasting options, which has been reinforced by their recent purchases.
- **Purchase Behavior:** Tends to buy products that deliver a positive initial experience, often expressing strong satisfaction and readiness to purchase multiples. Shows openness to exploring related beauty products and tools that complement their primary interests.
- **Reviewing Style:** Expresses genuine affection for products in reviews, highlighting specific attributes like effectiveness and ease of use. Utilizes enthusiastic language and positive reinforcement, showcasing a strong sense of satisfaction with their purchases.
- **Trend Awareness:** Actively engages with beauty trends and utilizes sales or promotions to enhance their collection, staying proactive in keeping up-to-date with product releases and availability across various beauty categories.

Overall, the user is focused on quality, value, and aesthetic appeal, with a positive and enthusiastic approach to their beauty regimen. Their recent acquisition of a nail care kit reflects a growing interest in holistic beauty experiences.
